t: GoldStar - Wikipedia
s: 1 month ago - GoldStar was a South Korean electronics company established in 1958. The corporate name was changed to LG Electronics and LG Cable on February 28, 1995, after merging with Lucky Chemical. LG Cable was spun off from LG Electronics and changed its name to LS Cable in 2005.

t: LG Electronics - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - In April 2021, after months of speculation, LG confirmed that the smartphone division will be officially shut down in July 2021. The decision to shut down LG Mobile came about from poor sales caused by stiff competition from rival Samsung and Chinese brands such as Oppo and Xiaomi.

t: What Does LG Stand For? | Best Facts About LG in 2025 |
s: March 10, 2025 - The company underwent a name change in 1983, rebranding itself as Lucky-Goldstar or LG for short. The decision to change the name was strategic, as it aimed to establish a stronger international presence and distance itself from the perception of being solely a domestic brand.
